body.script:
var siteAlerts = [{"id":3825,"title":"School Closing","body":"
As our calendar indicates, our schools, as well as all charter schools will have their spring recess as scheduled, from April 9-April 17. Teachers will again provide instruction beginning April 20.\n
Como lo indica nuestro calendario, nuestras escuelas, así como todas las escuelas chárter tendrán su receso de primavera según lo programado, del 9 de abril al 17 de abril. Los maestros nuevamente brindarán instrucción a partir del 20 de abril.\n
\n
Governor Cuomo has announced that all schools will be closed until April 15 and he will then decide the date that schools reopen.\n
El Gobernador Cuomo ha anunciado que todas las escuelas estarán cerradas hasta el 15 de abril y luego decidirá la fecha en que las escuelas volverán a abrir.","dateStart":"2020-03-27T16:06:20Z","baseGroupName":"Icahn Charter Schools","hash":"BjrcliYLL6X4JRnYdO4C6cH6Ejkq6m6koYk0XV+GJDY=","updateDate":"2020-04-01T16:55:07Z"}];

img.div: Raising the bar in academic achievement.

div.h3: Welcome Back! We hope all of our families are safe and well.

p.strong: For information on the nearest location for your child to pick up breakfast, lunch and dinner please go to this link:
You will be asked your address and other questions to give you the nearest city school.

div.aria-label: Upcoming Charter School Public Hearing (4/21) Impacting CSD 11- Icahn Charter School 2-5

h2.span: Upcoming Charter School Public Hearing (4/21) Impacting CSD 11- Icahn Charter School 2-5

div.p: Icahn 5 is a close-knit educational community that promotes the academic and social development of all students in a safe, friendly environment. Use this site to access resources and information about learning with us.

strong.span: February 17th- 21st- Mid Winter Recess- NO SCHOOL
February 27th- Half Day (12:00pm dismissal)- Parent Teacher Conferences
May 18th- Grade 4 and 8- Science Performance Exam
June 1st- 4th and 8th grade Science Written Test
